title:
A sum rule for $r$-derangements obtained from the Cauchy product of
  exponential generating functions
abstract:
We propose a sum rule for $r$-derangements (meaning that the elements are
restricted to be in distinct cycles in the cycle decomposition) involving
binomial coefficients. The identity, obtained using the Cauchy product of two
exponential generating functions, generalizes a known relation for usual
derangements.
